MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:12am. Our engineers are currently onsite near Stanmore Road and the team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:47am on the 29th of January 2021
